mapper.select: select f.*,sum(ti.flightcount) 'count',min(ti.price) 'price',t.name 'brandName',t.type 'brandNameType',concat(ifnull(a1.name,''),'-',ifnull(a2.name,''),'-',ifnull(a3.name,''))"startArea", concat(ifnull(t1.name,''),'-',ifnull(t2.name,''),'-',ifnull(t3.name,''))"entArea" from t_flight f left join t_type t on f.typeId=t.id left join t_ticket ti on f.id=ti.flightId left join t_area a1 on f.startArea1=a1.id left join t_area a2 on f.startArea2=a2.id left join t_area a3 on f.startArea3=a3.id left join t_area t1 on f.entArea1=t1.id left join t_area t2 on f.entArea2=t2.id left join t_area t3 on f.entArea3=t3.id group by ti.flightId limit #{start},#{length}
mapper.update: update t_flight t set t.zt=#{zt} where t.id=#{id}
